Package main.java.model

Class AbstractPortfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.model.AbstractPortfolio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Portfolio
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlexiblePortfolio, InFlexiblePortfolio
    public abstract class AbstractPortfolio
extends java.lang.Object
implements Portfolio
    Abstract Portfolio class that implements Portfolio interface. This class holds the main data associated with the portfolio like list of stocks,portfolioName,dateAdded etc.
